title: Hiraku Nakajima
snippet: Although I send emails to ask help as the President of the IMU, they are sent from a special email address which has mathunion.org after @. They are also digitally signed · I would ask you to be careful for suspicious requests. Link to Nakajima's website

title: Hiraku Nakajima elected President of the International Mathematical Union | Kavli IPMU-カブリ数物連携宇宙研究機構
snippet: Nakajima has served on several IMU-related committees since 2006. He will take over as IMU President from 2023 and serve for four years. About Hiraku Nakajima Hiraku Nakajima received his PhD in Science from the University of Tokyo in 1991.
